description:
Mental Health/Well Being Center providing services for children (5-12), teens/adolescents (12-19), adults, and elders. Providing individual, family/couples sessions. Specializing in mood disorders and assisting with the following issues:

* Academic Underachievement
* Anxiety
* Coping Skills
* Depression
* Developmental Disorders
* Divorce
* Family Conflict
* Grief
* Peer Relationships
* Self Esteem
* Suicidal Ideation
* Women's Issues

Using treatment modalities of:

* Emotionally Focused
* Existential
* Expressive Arts
* Humanistic
* Mindfulness-based (MBCT)
* Play Therapy
* Solution Focused Brief (SFBT)
* Transpersonal
name: LIFE CENTER FOR HEALING AND GROWTH
